disobedience.question:
Did I mock the Church? 

This sin involves using words to show contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespecting the Body of Christ, and undermining the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit. Consider whether your thoughts or actions were intentionally derogatory or critical toward the Church in any context, such as discussions with friends or family, online interactions, or public statements.
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

condoning.question: Did I give my approval for another Catholic to marry outside the Church?

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that deny their dignity as children of God

uncharity.question: Did I lose my patience with others when we disagreed on something?

uncharity.question: Have I neglected to assist those in need, especially when they were looking for help?

gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private matters about friends or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private matters about friends or acquaintances, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in conversations where I share private matters about others for my own amusement
gossip.question: Have I indulged in conversations where I share private matters about others for my own amusement, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
